# Uganda Head of State
## Timeline

```{r, out.width = "60%", fig.align = 'center', fig.cap="Image from Wikipedia, Residence of former ruler Idi Amin"}

masthead <- "assets/residence-of-idi-amin.jpg"
knitr::include_graphics(masthead, dpi=72)

```

> I shall not be deterred by people who don't see where the future of Africa lies...\
--- Yoweri Museveni 


***

### Load data [Ingest]


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/heads-of-state/uganda-head-of-state.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


### Prepare data [Wrangle]


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

#Assign an id for each individual person (Each person may held office multiple times)
df$Name <- factor(df$Name, levels = c("Yoweri Museveni", "Tito Okello", "Bazilio Olara-Okello", "Milton Obote", "Presidential Commission", "Paulo Muwanga", "Godfrey Binaisa", "Yusuf Lule", "Idi Amin", "Edward Mutesa"))
df <- transform(df,id=as.numeric(Name))

# custom h-just for geom_text annotations
df$just <- c(-0.5, 0.05, -2.5, -0.4, -0.4, -0.4, -0.3, 1.1, 1.1, 1.1, 1.1 )
df[2,1] <- ''

head(df, n=10)

```


### Plot [ Views / Temporals ]


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
    plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 23, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 18),
    plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 10),
    axis.title.y = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_blank(),
    # axis.text.x = element_text(vjust = 12),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    panel.background = element_blank(),
    #panel.grid.minor = element_blank(), # remove minor gridlines
    panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # remove x (vertical) gridlines
    legend.title = element_blank(), # remove legend title
    legend.text = element_text(color = "black", size = 8),
    legend.position='bottom'
  )

v1 <- ggplot(df, aes(x = Start, y = id, color = Political.Party)) +
 geom_segment(aes(xend = End, yend = id, color = Political.Party), size = 6) +
 geom_text(aes(label = Name, hjust = just), size = 6, show.legend = FALSE) +
 scale_color_manual(values = c("Kabaka Yekka" = "#35aa56", "National Resistance Movement" = "#FCB322", "Independent" = "#b97a56", "Uganda People's Congress" = "#004266", "Uganda Army"  = "#D62828")) +
   labs(title = "Heads of State of Uganda",
        subtitle = "Timeline as Heads")+
   theme_bw() + 
  theme_opts
   
   
girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 9,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 0.9)))


```
